name: Shake IT Off (damvcoool)
description:
You appear to be the lone Survivor of the impending doom your planet is facing. it's your last chance of scape, however your ThermoExoSuit is far to attractive and all the junk is getting attached to you.

You have to shake off the junk from time to time to regain your speed.

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to release Junk

This game was made using:

  •  Unity 2021.3
  • Game Creator 2 by Catsoft Works
  • Dreamteck Splines by Dreamteck
  • GeNa Pro by Procedural Worlds
  • GUI Pro Kit Sci-Fi by Layer Lab
  • Interface & Items Sounds by Daydream Sound
  • Colossal Game Music Collection by The Indie Dev Nation
  • Caster Mage Animations by Kevin Iglesias
  • Loading Screen Studio by Michsky
  • Polygon Sci-Fi Space by Synty Studios
  • Polygon Sci-Fi City by Synty Studios
  • Polygon ParticleFX by Synty Studios
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French
  • Ultimate Sound FX Bundle by Sidearm Studios
